Literature.Title: Structural and initial biological analysis of synthetic arylomycin A2.
Literature.Author: Roberts TC, Smith PA, Cirz RT, Romesberg FE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli MG1655 w/PMBn(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=0.5µM),Bacillus anthracis Sterne(MIC=32µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(no activity data),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(no activity data)
